block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS - Named Tom Candiotti speical assistant to baseball operations.
National league PHILDAELPHIA PHILLIES - Fired manager Terry Francona, hitting coach Hal McRae, first base coach Brad Mills, pitching coach Galen Cisco and bench coach Chuck Cottier.
American League CLEVELAND INDIANS - Named Tom Candiotti speical assistant to baseball operations.
National league PHILDAELPHIA PHILLIES - Fired manager Terry Francona, hitting coach Hal McRae, first base coach Brad Mills, pitching coach Galen Cisco and bench coach Chuck Cottier.
National Basketball Association INDIANA PACERS - Named Vern Fleming assistant coach.
National Football League GIANTS - Waived LB Kevin Lewis. Signed K Jaret Holmes. GREEN BAY PACKERS - Signed TE Ryan Welnight. Waived DB Jason Moore.

National Hockey League DALLAS STARS - Assigned F Greg Leeb, D Jeff MacMillan and G Rick Tabaracci to Utah of the IHL. Signed F Jimmy Roy to a one-year contract and assigned him on loan to Manitoba of the IHL. DETROIT RED WINGS - Signed Jim Devellano, senior vice president, to a four-year contract extension through 2004. Assigned F Sean Avery and F Mike Sgroi to Cincinnati of the AHL. SAN JOSE SHARKS - Signed D Marcus Ragnarsson and F Alex Korolyuk to two-year contracts.
Western Professional Hockey League SAN ANGELO OUTLAWS - Signed D Cam Law, C Craig Stephenson, and D Erik Noack.
FRANCIS MARION - Named Darwin Vickery assistant baseball coach. GEORGIA TECH - Named Chris Huffins men's and women's assistant track and field coach.
